improvement_list.improvement_desc: Division by zero is possible if y becomes zero. Add a check to handle this scenario.
The result of x/y is assigned to z. This is a potential source of runtime error. The type of x and y are integer while z can be a floating point number.
The loop iterates 49 times. The value of x is decremented each time.  The value of x will be -49 at the end of the loop.
